Sentencas: Screen-printing is a commonly used technique to fabricate thick film solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrodes, followed by drying and high temperature sintering, and this study focuses on the rheology of such screen-printing inks for SOFC anode fabrication, and in particular on the effect of solids content.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Commercially available powders of NiO and scandia stabilized zirconia were used, with average particle sizes of 0.714 and 2.151 mu m, respectively.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thixotropy and viscosity of inks increased with increasing solid content.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The particle network strength, important to the production of films with good particle connectivity and mechanical strength, also increased as the solids content increased.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The complex modulus, G*, (indicative of the overall elasticity and tackiness of the inks) ranged from 500 to 4000 Pa, a range found acceptable for screen-printing.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The minimum and maximum acceptable solids content were determined to be 25 and 30 vol% respectively.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Inks having solids content outside this range were too liquid like and tacky, respectively, for effective screen-printing.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The percentage of ink recovery, indicative of the print quality of the resultant films, also increased with solid content.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The relevant properties of the anode films, including mechanical strength, electronic conductivity and electrochemical performance, all improved with increasing solids content as a result of improved particle connectivity, consistent with the conclusions drawn from the rheological study.
Titulo: The effect of solids loading on the screen-printing and properties of nickel/scandia-stabilized-zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In summary, from the perspective of ink rheology, screen-printability and performance, inks having 28-30 vol% solids were determined as the most suitable for the production of high quality SOFC anode films with a thickness of around 10 mu m.
